Kugbo
Native to Nigeria
Region Rivers State
Native speakers
 (2,000 cited 1973)[1]
Language family
Niger–Congo
  • Atlantic–Congo
    • Benue–Congo
      • Cross River
        • Central Delta
          • Kugbo
Language codes
ISO 639-3 kes
Glottolog kugb1241[2]

Kugbo is a Central Delta language of Nigeria.

References[edit]

  1. ^ Kugbo at Ethnologue (18th ed., 2015)
  2. ^ Hammarström, Harald; Forkel, Robert; Haspelmath, Martin, eds. (2017). "Kugbo". Glottolog 3.0. Jena, Germany: Max Planck Institute for the Science of Human History.
